author: James Tanner
method: Place all of the dipping sauce ingredients into a small bowl and mix well. To serve, place the prawn crackers onto a plate with the dipping sauce in a bowl alongside.
ingredients: 200g/7oz ready-made prawn crackers,  1 tsp Dijon mustard,  2 tbsp olive oil,  Â½ tsp white wine vinegar,  1 tbsp runny honey,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander
